data.name: Auto Awnings and Shades
data.address: 1922 W Pioneer Pkwy Ste E, Arlington, TX 76013

reviews.text: 1922 W Pioneer Pkwy Ste E, Arlington, TX 76013 Accuracy in work and appointments, very good prices, excellent treatment, I wish you continued success
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"Best quality and best price in town I highly recommend it" "First of all, thank you to this company and the staff who work in it." "Best Awning and shades ever, affordable prices, pro service
Save me $1,000 my HOA was on me about replacing my awing and all the companys I called wanted place. These guys were able to repair for $350 I'm happy I will be able to use for another 4-5 years.

I have used these guys two times now and they truely deliver an excellent product.  We have had our RV seats in 2 RVs done and both time their work and response time was quick while keeping the quality high.  I will continue to use them for our upholstery needs.

Omer, was great. He re upholstered the seats in our motorhome and did it in just 4 days. He is super friendly and his work is very clean and just dropped off the couch for him to reupholster and he will ha e it done by Thursday this week as … More
